high_consensus.description: Ship gates specify latency targets but the plan lacks a benchmark harness, environment definition, and pass/fail criteria (percentiles, warmup, runner specs). Add concrete benchmark setup to S12-T5.

SG-6 (budget zero overspend at 100 concurrent) has no implementation path. Add 100-concurrency load test with k6/artillery plus budget assertions, define what 'zero overspend' means under retries/aborts.
SG-8 (Redis failover 503 <30s) lacks concrete procedure and acceptance criteria. Define failover mode (Sentinel vs Cluster), test steps, and measurement (time-to-503 recovery).

blockers.concern: Sprint timeline aggressive for solo developer (2-3 day sprints with ~1400-1600 LOC)
Idempotency semantics across HTTP SSE reconnect, STREAM_RESUME_LOST restart, and platform-derived keys may conflict
Req-hash canonicalization via JSON.stringify fragile across middleware/fetch implementations
Abort reconciliation job idempotency/dedupe not specified (risk of double-commit)
